message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $90 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little, but I need to get at least $105 for the product.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $98. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $98 is still too low.  How about we split the difference and go with $101.50?  I'm really hoping we can reach an agreement on this.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $97.50 for the product. I hope we can meet in the middle this time.
